description: OnePlus Pad 2 Pro is set to launch in China next week and a listing on Oppo's China store has revealed the tablet's existence, detailing its RAM and storage options and two available colourways. The tablet could be powered by a Snapdragon 8 Elite chip and pack a 12,140mAh battery.
title: OnePlus Pad 2 Pro Listed on Oppo's Website Ahead of Launch on May 13

description: Alienware 16 Aurora and Alienware 16X Aurora, the latest entry-level and mid-tier gaming laptops from Dell's Alienware, were launched on Friday. Sporting a more subtle design than typical Alienware models, these laptops are equipped with up to Intel Core Ultra 9 processors, 64GB of RAM, 2TB of SSD storage, and up to Nvidia GeForce RTX 5070 GPUs. They come with Windows 11 and offer support for Wi-Fi 7 connectivity.
title: Alienware 16 Aurora, 16X Aurora With Up to Intel Core Ultra 9 CPU, GeForce RTX 5070 GPU Launched

description: Sony Xperia 1 VII is scheduled to launch next week with a familiar design, according to leaked renders showcasing three color options. The renders of the Xperia 1 VII, successor to the Xperia 1 VI, suggest minimal design changes. Sony has also announced that its new flagship headphones, the Sony WH-1000XM6, will launch on May 15.
title: Sony Xperia 1 VII Design, Colour Options Spotted in Leaked Renders; Sony WH-1000XM6 to Debut on May 15

description: The US Federal Trade Commission (FTC) stated on Friday that the Department of Justice's (DOJ) proposal requiring Alphabet's Google to share search data with competitors includes sufficient safeguards to protect user privacy. This assessment comes as the DOJ pursues measures to boost competition, following a ruling in August that Google holds an illegal monopoly in the online search market.
title: US FTC Backs DOJ Proposal in Google Search Antitrust Case

description: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 dimensions have been leaked by a tipster, suggesting it will be wider and taller than the current Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 6 model. The next-generation foldable phone is also tipped to feature significantly thinner bezels on its internal display.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 Dimensions Surface Online; Inner Screen Tipped to Feature Slim Bezels

description: Baidu has filed a patent application for an AI system aimed at translating animal sounds, like meows, into human language. The proposed technology, detailed in a recently published patent document, would analyse animal vocalisations along with their behaviour and body signals to infer emotions and convert them into understandable words.
title: Baidu Looks to Patent AI System to Decipher Animal Sounds

description: The Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MeitY) has released online safety guidelines for citizens in the wake of Operation Sindoor. The advisory aims to educate users about the risks of misinformation and emphasises the need for cybersecurity precautions. Users have been urged to report any misinformation to the PIB via WhatsApp and email.
title: Operation Sindoor: Important Dos and Don'ts Shared by IT Ministry to Prevent Misinformation
